api_list.name: countryList
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://arabiccountrylist.p.rapidapi.com/mi2tech/public/api/v1/country/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "arabiccountrylist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
